ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They turned to face each other in mutual accusation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then they started blaming one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then they began to reproach one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Some of them started to blame others.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they came towards each other, blaming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then they turned one against another, blaming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then some of them advanced against others, blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they advanced one upon another, blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then some of them drew near unto others, self-reproaching.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then they began to heap reproaches on each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they turned to each other reproaching
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then they turned to one another, blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then they turned, one against another, in reproach.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then they turned, one against another, in blaming.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they came blaming one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then they turned to one another, blaming one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then they approached one another, blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [68:30] They then turned to one another, blaming each other.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then some of them drew near unto others, self-reproaching) reproaching one another.
